resources.string: Welcome to StockTracker! In this section you can get a brief introduction into the platform.
Search for a ticker symbol to add to your list.
In the first section of the app titled StockData you can get the latest stock prices through the graph and see a list of your favorite stocks!
The second section of the application will allow you to search for different ticker symbols, and if preferred add them into your favorite list to later check that stock\'s particular price graph
In the News section you will receive daily byte sized news concerning the finance world
Finally, the preferences section gives you the ability to change several properties of the app for a truly unique experience!
